hadiths.text: Jabir reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:When any one of you observes prayer in the mosque he should reserve a part of his prayer for his house, for Allah would make the prayer as a means of betterment in his house

chapter.ara-name: باب اسْتِحْبَابِ صَلاَةِ النَّافِلَةِ فِي بَيْتِهِ وَجَوَازِهَا فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: It is recommended to offer voluntary prayers in one’s house although it is permissible to offer them in the masjid
